main.name: Samvita Karkal

education.school: Sinhgad College of Engineering, Pune, India

experience.title: Application Developer
experience.description: Worked on developing end-to-end features in applications with Ruby on Rails, React, Redis, Solr (sunspot) & Elasticsearch (searchkick), MySQL, Minitest, AWS and Git stack. With the help of a senior, ported an application from Solr to Elasticsearch and managed maintainance of an entire product single-handedly for 3 months.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Worked on Ruby on rails + React projects with Sidekiq, Heroku, CircleCi and Github. Developed end-to-end web products with the above stack. Also, wrote code with TDD approach using Rspec for writing test cases.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.description: Worked on Twilio-based tasks on a React project. Integrated project with bootstrap and created reusable components for use throughout the application. Also, won ACE award for good design and timely completion of assigned work.
